definition: horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent
forehead/horizontal tablet or inscribed board/specified number or amount

sentences.english: No banners or flags shall be hung without permission.
sentences.chinese: 各機構不可擅自掛上任何橫額或旗幟。

sentences.english: We allow you to run maximum of 3 banners per website for absolutely free.
sentences.chinese: 我們讓您運行的最高3橫額百分之網站完全免費的。

sentences.english: A banner recycling bin has been placed in the car park of Bethlehem Hall since late May.
sentences.chinese: 書院於五月底在伯利衝宿舍停車場增設了橫額回收箱。

sentences.english: One of the banners put up by my office.
sentences.chinese: 其中一幅由本人辦事處張貼的橫額。

definition: gongs and drums overture to a Chinese opera/to create a disturbance
to hold a (business) meeting/to start negotiations
to cause trouble/to provoke a dispute
to avoid the important and dwell on the trivial/to keep silent about major charges while admitting minor ones
